fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose any role to disguise yourself as. The disguise will activate the following night and remain until you use this ability again.
- Convert a player into a Chill Pickle. Chill Pickles secretly lose all abilities and attributes of their original role, and all actions that they attempt will fail without feedback. Chill Pickles can still vote in day chat. Does not count as a visit from you.
- Shoot a player with an Overkill attack. If they survive, they will be roleblocked, or if they are roleblock-immune, their abilities will fail that night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock, Control, and Redirect immune
- Any player who attempts to roleblock you will deal themselves an Overkill attack instead.
- If you are jailed by a jailor-type role, they will deal themselves an Overkill attack at the end of the night.
- If you die before reaching your goal, any player turned into a Chill Pickle will revert to their original role, with the same number of ability uses they had prior to being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill or convert every living player into a Chill Pickle.
